about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Leading the global market with innovation and trust.
about.description: Maru Media captures special moments through creative videos and artistic photography. Located in Hotan-dong, Jinju, we specialize in video editing and photography to create meaningful impact for brands and individuals.
